newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates - Mostly steady to up on call.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates - Mostly steady to up on call.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted at mostly steady to higher levels Friday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session, the Exchange said.
One barge traded versus no trades Thursday.
- One barge, Illinois River, next week, traded at 150 percent of tariff.
- One barge, mid-Mississippi, next week, bid at 160 percent, up 10 percentage points, offer 175 percent.
- One barge, Hennepin, Illinois River, on station, no bid, offer 160 percent.
- Four barges, Mid-Mississippi, one each week of April, bid 150 percent, offer 155 percent.
- Four barges, Lacrose-Savage (Upper Mississippi), one each week of April, bid 180 percent, offer 197-1/2 percent.
- Four barges, Illinois River, one each week of April, no bid, offer 142-1/2 percent.
- Four barges, Mid-Mississippi, one each week of May, bid 130 percent, no offer.
